subject: Heisman Trophy
Football
College Athletics
Awards, Decorations and Honors
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: West Virginia’s Geno Smith, who had 656 passing yards against Baylor on Saturday, has emerged as the presumptive front-runner to win the Heisman Trophy.
snippet: West Virginia’s Geno Smith, who had 656 passing yards against Baylor on Saturday, has emerged as the presumptive front-runner to win the Heisman Trophy.
